Posts.Content: the_mom2 wrote: I am not real sure if this is where i should be but i am scared out of my wits. My daughter is a breast Cancer survivor at just under 28. today after 2 years she found a pea size lump and has shooting pain in her arm. I have tried to find answers and no one has said about the shooting pains. SHe had a bilateral mastectomy and a reconstruction both breasts. Does anyone have any idea what this is ? I am praying so hard it isnt a recurranace Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: pain in the arm the_mom2 Moderators
